item.title: Bhakti Ratnakar Sakhar
item.description: In the Sanskrit language of the world, the most famous ‘devotional’ book is called ‘devotional personality’. The main Sanskrit text of yat has been written in 38 short stories. Now a valuable book is available in the school class. First Edition: 2003 Publisher: Assam Literary Meet

In the last few years, the goal of the game was to improve the performance of the last ball of the innings.

item.title: Dr. Dwijendra Nath Bhakat
item.description: Dr. Dwijendra Nath Bhakat (born 2 February 1954) is a writer, poet and literary critic of Assamese, Rajbangshi and Bengali language. His literary work has been mostly in two fields: Vaishnavite literature and culture and Rajbangshi language, literature and culture. He worked in Golakganj Chilarai College of Western Assam for more than three decades as Associate Professor of Assamese Language. He has also worked as a Research Guide of MIL (Modern Indian Language) department of Gauhati University.
